layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x386
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x386
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x370
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x370 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 200x206 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (78,3) size 44x36
            text run at (78,3) width 44: "cap"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,207) size 198x162
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,30) size 198x102

                text run at (1,1) width 38: "foo bar"
                text run at (1,17) width 18: "baz"
